partintro.para: This package contains basic support API available to other packages.

warning.para: The plan is that most of this will become stable API. At that point the package name will change to something like cockpit1. The latest package will always track the latest version of these APIs.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: These are the standard Cockpit CSS stylesheets. They automatically pull in the PatternFly and Bootstrap styles that they depend on. When you bring these into your component, do not include patternfly.css explicitly as well.
The exact styles available beyond what's in PatternFly is not yet documented or public API.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: To use jQuery in your package include the above script. Other Cockpit and PatternFly code requires jQuery. You should always load it, if you use any of the other Cockpit javascript code. It should be the first javascript module loaded.
The current jQuery version is 2.x. In the latest package we may track relatively recent versions of jQuery. Other packages may provide more stable versions of jQuery in the future.
Also included in this file are the jQuery plugins used. For this package these these are: Bootstrap 3.0.3, bootstrap-select 1.6.3, bootstrap-datepicker 1.4.0, and Flot 0.7.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The standard PatternFly stylesheets. If you include cockpit.css then don't include this directly. It is firmly recommended to use PatternFly as the feel for your Cockpit component.
The version of PatternFly is an early prototype, and will be updated soon. See the PatternFly documentation for information on the widgets and classes available.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This is the Require JS javascript loader. It supports Asynchronous Module Definition and allows javascript modules to declare dependencies to load.
The current Require JS version is 2.1.x.
